mapper.insert: insert into access_request (uuid, resource_owner_uuid, client_uuid, redirect_URI) values ( #{accessRequest.uuid}, #{accessRequest.resourceOwnerUUID}, #{accessRequest.clientUUID}, #{accessRequest.redirectURI, typeHandler=org.rootservices.authorization.persistence.mapper.typehandler.OptionalURITypeHandler} )
mapper.select: select ar.uuid, ar.resource_owner_uuid, ar.redirect_uri, ar.created_at, ars.uuid as ars_uuid, ars.created_at as ars_created_at, ars_scope.uuid as ars_scope_uuid, ars_scope.name as ars_scope_name, ars_scope.created_at as ars_scope_created_at from access_request as ar join access_request_scopes ars on ars.access_request_uuid = ar.uuid join scope ars_scope on ars_scope.uuid = ars.scope_uuid join auth_code on auth_code.access_request_uuid = ar.uuid join token on token.auth_code_uuid = auth_code.uuid where token.token = #{accessToken}
